metadata.name: Executable from Webdav
metadata.comment: Detects executable access via webdav6. Can be seen in APT 29 such as from the emulated APT 29 hackathon https://github.com/OTRF/detection-hackathon-apt29/

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('webdav')) AND contains(lower(http_request.url), lower('webdav')) AND contains(lower(http_response.content_type), lower('dosexec')) AND endswith(lower(http_request.url), lower('.exe')))

output.summary: Detects executable access via webdav6. Can be seen in APT 29 such as from the emulated APT 29 hackathon https://github.com/OTRF/detection-hackathon-apt29/
